scripts.compare: npm run generate && esperanto -i src -o cjs2 -t cjs -s && browserify -e cjs2/index.js -s THREE > dist/three.browserify.js
scripts.compare_old: npm run generate && babel src -l es6.modules --out-dir cjs && browserify -e cjs/index.js -s THREE > dist/three.browserify.js
scripts.build: npm run generate && rollup -i src/index.js -o dist/three.js -f umd -n THREE && uglifyjs -c -m -o dist/three.min.js -- dist/three.js
scripts.update-three: rm -rf three.js && git clone https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js && cd three.js && git checkout dev
